FONT_DESCRIPTION: You can use this command to apply a Glow onto the font of a card or to toggle its Gen, Name or Series.
ERROR_FINDING_CARD: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_GIF_3D: {{author}} You cannot change the text on **3D** or **GIF** cards
NOT_ENOUGH_GEMS: You don't have enough amount of gems to make this purchase
NOT_ENOUGH_SILVERS: You don't have enough amount of silvers to make this purchase
